overview: Revival! is a thoroughly innovative celebration of the life and ministry of Jesus Christ through faith, film and theatre. A Gospel musical based on the poetic Book of John, Revival! is a letter from Jesus to a troubled and ever contemporary world.
tagline: Revival! is a thoroughly innovative celebration of the life and ministry of Jesus Christ through faith, film and theatre. A Gospel musical based on the poetic Book of John, Revival! is a letter from Jesus to a troubled and ever contemporary world.
title: Revival! The Experience
